description: The SportsInJSON Soccer schema contains properties common to Basketball.

basketballPlayerStats.description: Specific statistics for basketball players. | Includes offensive, rebounding, and defensive stats.

minutesPlayed.description: Number of minutes this player has spent playing during a particular game.

gamesStarted.description: Number of games that started with this player on the court,.

averageMinutesPerGame.description: Average number of minutes per game played by this player.

personalFoulsPerGame.description: Average number of fouls made by the player per game.

doubleDoubles.description: A double digit number in any two of these categories: points, rebounds, assists, steals, and blocked shots.

tripleDoubles.description: A double digit number in any three of these categories: points, rebounds, assists, steals, and blocked shots.

basketballTeamStats.description: Specific statistics for basketball. | Includes offensive, rebounding, and defensive stats.

timeoutsLeft.description: Number of timeouts a team has left during the current event.

largestLead.description: Largest number of points this team has led the opposition. Could be a negative number.

foulsTotal.description: Total number of fouls comitted by the team during this event.

turnoverMargin.description: Turnover margain is the number of turnovers made by this team minus the number of turnovers made by the opposing team.

basketballStatsOffensive.description: Statistics for a team or player while they had possession of the ball. | Includes scoring and assisting stats.

fieldGoalsMade.description: Shots made that were worth two points each.

fieldGoalsPercentage.description: Field goals made versus attempted. This could also be calculated from the above.

fieldGoalsPerGame.description: Average number of field goals made per game.

fieldGoalsAttemptedPerGame.description: Average number of field goals attempted per game.

threePointersMade.description: Shots made that were worth three points each.

threePointersPercentage.description: Three-pointers made versus attempted. This could be calculated.

threePointersPerGame.description: Average number of three-pointers made per game.

threePointersAttemptedPerGame.description: Average number of three-pointers attempted per game.

freeThrowsMade.description: Shots made that were worth one point each.

freeThrowsPerGame.description: Average number of free throws made per game.

freeThrowsAttemptedPerGame.description: Average number of free throws attempted per game.

pointsScoredTotal.description: Total number of points scored, over.

pointsScoredPerGame.description: Average number of points scored in games played.

pointsScoredPerGameHighest.description: Highest number of points scored in one game played.

pointsScoredPerShot.description: Calculated by dividing points-scored-total by field-goals-attempted.

assistsPerGame.description: Total number of assists per games played.

turnoversPerGame.description: Average number of turnovers per game.

teamTurnoversPerGame.description: Average number of team turnovers per game.

pointsScoredOffTurnovers.description: Total number of points scored off turnovers.

pointsScoredInPaint.description: Total number of points scored from within the painted area surrounding the basket.

pointsScoredOnSecondChance.description: Total number of points scored after fielding an offensive rebound.

pointsScoredOnFastBreak.description: Total number of points scored off a fast break.

basketballStatsRebounding.description: Statistics for a team or player revolving around rebounds. | Includes rebounds credited to particular players, and credited to the entire team.

reboundsTotal.description: The sum of all rebounds that were credited to particular players.

reboundsTotalPercentage.description: The percentage of rebounds total compared to total number of attempts.

reboundsDefensive.description: The sum of all defensive rebounds credited to particular players. A defensive rebound occurs when the team is in defence but gains possession through a rebound.

reboundsOpponentDefensive.description: The total defensive rebounds by the opposing team or player.

reboundsOffensive.description: The sum of all offensive rebounds credited to particular player. An offensive rebound is when the team keep possession of the ball through a rebound.

reboundsOpponentOffensive.description: The total offensive rebounds by the opposing team or player.

teamReboundsTotal.description: The number of rebounds that did not credited to individual players, but were instead credited to the team as a whole.

teamReboundsDefensive.description: The sum of all defensive rebounds credited to the team as a whole.

teamReboundsDefensivePercentage.description: The percentage of defensive rebounds credited to the team.

teamReboundsOffensive.description: The sum of all offensive rebounds credited to the team as a whol.

teamReboundsOffensivePercentage.description: The percentage of offensive rebounds credited to the team.

teamReboundsOpponentDefensive.description: The total defensive team rebounds by the opposing team or player.

teamReboundsOpponentOffensive.description: The total offensive team rebounds by the opposing team or player.

reboundsPerGame.description: The average number of personal rebounds per game.

teamReboundsPerGame.description: The average number of team rebounds per game.

reboundsOffensivePerGame.description: The average number of offensive personal rebounds per game.

reboundsDefensivePerGame.description: The average numer of defensive personal rebounds per game.

reboundsDifferential.description: The differential between the total number of rebounds from this team compared to the opposing team.

reboundsOpponentTotal.description: The total number of rebounds (ofensive and defensive) by the opposing team or player.

teamReboundsOpponentTotal.description: The total number of rebounds (ofensive and defensive) by the opponent which are credited to the team.

basketballStatsDefensive.description: Statistics for a team or player while the other team was in possession of the ball. | Includes information on steals and blocks.

stealsPerGame.description: Average number of steals per game.

stealsOpponent.description: Total number of steals-against by opponent.

stealsDifferential.description: The number of steals made by this team compared to steals made by the other team.

blocksPerGame.description: Average number of blocks per game.

blocksOpponent.description: Total number of blocks-against by opponent.

blocksDifferential.description: Total number of blocks made by this team compared to blocks made by the other team.

pointsScoredAgainstPerGame.description: Average of points scored against per game.

pointsScoredAgainstPerGameHighest.description: Highest number of points scored against in one game played.

fieldGoalsAgainstPerGame.description: The average number of field goals scored agains per game.

fieldGoalsAgainstPercentage.description: The percentage of field goals scored against.

chargesTaken.description: Total number of charges taken. A charge is when the referee toss the ball and one player of each team try to give their team possession of the ball.
